scene_01.speaker: kiupita
scene_01.text: Hey, can we talk for a moment?

scene_02.speaker: kiupita
scene_02.text: I tried to be friendly and get to know you, but... it feels like you're not interested.

scene_03.speaker: kiupita
scene_03.text: I think it's best if we just stay classmates. Nothing more.

scene_04.text: You go your separate ways. The opportunity for friendship has passed.

scene_05.text: The rest of the year, you barely acknowledge each other in the halls.

final.text: BAD ENDING - You failed to build a meaningful connection. The relationship never had a chance to grow.
